"-List of Ingredients and Mixing Formulas-" "1. Low Level Reagent Formulas" "Dracoplasm:" 10 wyrm's blood, 1 blood root "Magma Dust:" 10 lava stones, 1 volcanic ash "Moon Dust:" 10 moonstone shards, 1 volcanic ash "Necroplasm:" 10 rotten bone pieces, 1 blood root "Demonplasm:" 10 demon's blood, 1 blood root "Inferno Dust:" 10 infernium ore, 1 volcanic ash "2. High Level Reagent Formulas" "Draconic Essence:" 10 dracoplasms, 1 quicksilver "Fire Essence:" 10 magma dusts, 1 sulfur "Lunargent:" 10 moon dusts, 1 quicksilver "Midnight Oil:" 10 necroplasms, 1 quicksilver "Demonic Essence:" 10 demonplasms, 1 sulfur "Abyss Oil:" 10 inferno dusts, 1 sulfur "Hellfire Oil:" 1 fire essence, 1 demonic essence "Nightmare Oil:" 1 lunargent, 1 midnight oil "Pure Silver:" 1 lunargent, 1 quicksilver
